imdb.plot outline: Welcome to Jingle City. It is a peaceful fairy place inhabited by tiny human beings Jingliks and cute furry creatures Beasties. They constantly get drawn in all kind of incredible events and most importantly, they totally love it. No wonder. Jingliks and Beasties follow the one and only rule - Not a day without an adventure.
imdb.title: Jingliks
plot: Welcome to Jingle City. It is a peaceful fairy place inhabited by tiny human beings _Jingliks_ (qv) and cute furry creatures Beasties, who follow the one and only rule - Not a day without an adventure.

Welcome to Jingle City. It is a peaceful fairy place inhabited by tiny human beings _Jingliks_ (qv) and cute furry creatures Beasties. They constantly get drawn in all kind of incredible events and most importantly, they totally love it. No wonder. _Jingliks_ (qv) and Beasties follow the one and only rule - Not a day without an adventure.::Amina Vereschagina

Welcome to Jingle City. It is a peaceful fairy place inhabited by tiny human beings _Jingliks_ (qv) and cute furry creatures beasties. They constantly get drawn in all kind of incredible events and most importantly, they totally love it. No wonder. _Jingliks_ (qv) and beasties follow the one and only rule - Not a day without an adventure. The series is aimed to bring up the best qualities in children such as self-confidence, responsibility, generosity, purposefulness, kindness and tolerance. The show combines entertainment and gags with serious philosophical issues presented in a simple, child- friendly form. Such topics as conflict resolution, cooperation, friendship, forgiveness and optimism are essential for the show. The design of the show creates unique television experience. Outstanding art, detailed universe and top-quality animation develops good taste, imagination and creativity.
synopsis:
This top-quality animated TV show for children follows the adventures of cute fury creatures Beasties and tiny human beings Jingliks, who live altogether in a fairy Jingle City.
Jingliks represent different professional areas - art, culinary, science and history, fashion, mechanics, journalism and sports! Each jinglik is deeply passionate about what he or she does. The show encourages children to show interest in a vast range of activities and emphasizes various learning skills!
Marianne is the best chef in the city, who is most known for her delicious chocolate pie! She's loving and nice and takes care of everyone in Jingle City.
Andy is an artist favored by muses and fortune, who constantly stuns Jingle city with his «staggering» art.
Nikola is a genius engineer, who is crazy about robots! Actually he has already invented one!
Pancho is an egghead! He knows everything in the world and a little more! His passion is astronomy.
Finn is into boy scouting. He loves camping, hitchhiking and sports and he is really good at it.
Grace is a Jingle city it-girl and fashion designer. Moreover, she is a true beauty.
Caitlyn is a desperate journalist, who never stops looking for a sensation. If there is no sensation she is ready to make up one herself.
The main character of the show is the blue Beastie called Trouble, who really lives up to his name. He always draws jingliks in different tricky situations. He is the genuine troublemaker and adventurer who selflessly struggles boredom in Jingle City.
